page.title: 04SHOPS AND SERVICES
page.content: There are two shops open in the village throughout the year, one of which is a general food shop, selling meat, groceries, greengroceries, etc. The other is a more general store, selling, in addition to food, clothing and a variety of other goods. During the tourist season two additional shops are open. These, in general, cater for the visitors, selling souvenirs, pottery, trinkets, items of art and craft and other knick-knacks beloved of tourists and holiday makers. There is a small post office, a public house and a number of licensed restaurants, all of which are open throughout the year. The nearest garage and petrol filling station is at Zoar, some two miles from the village.
